RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Sinc e Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORNING LINE NEWS inside duel early, cleared into far turn from between horses, dug in gamely in the final furlong for the nod on the wire under stout handling. BELLE OF ST. JOHN saved ground never far back, shuffled far turn, led late between calls but nailed at the wire in a gutsy effort. AND I KNOW speed between horses to the half, between, kept gamely for show. TRAUMARAMA trailed to the half, angled out quarter pole with no response. LA MAMA CHULA tried to keep up three wide to the half, gave way far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Morning Line News
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside duel early, cleared into far turn, between horses, dug in

ENTRY.NAME: And I Know
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses to the half, between, kept gamely for show

ENTRY.NAME: La Mama Chula
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up three wide to the half, gave way far back

ENTRY.NAME: Belle of St. John
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground never far back, shuffled far turn, led late nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Traumarama
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the half, angled out quarter pole with no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUSIN ODELL speed to the lead, well rated throughout to go well clear in the final. GRASSROOTS wide run into first turn, perfect spot to far turn, no match late. RAMBLIN CHROME chased leader to the half, dueled briefly, could not keep up. NEVER SORRY raced along evenly with no late response when needed. FREAKY FRESH never in the hunt throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Freaky Fresh
ENTRY.COMMENT: never in the hunt throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Never Sorry
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly outside with no response

ENTRY.NAME: Cousin Odell
ENTRY.OWNER: Sides Clay R and Wong Jonathan
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the lead, well rated throughout to go well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Ramblin Chrome
ENTRY.OWNER: Sherman Art Sherman Alan and Harkins Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the half, dueled briefly, could not keep up

ENTRY.NAME: Grassroots
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide run into first turn, perfect spot to far turn, no match late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 1 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHROME'S RIGHT pressed leader to the half, took over, cleared off, held sway to the wire. SPECIAL A raced back to far turn, rallied along while coming on too late at the wire. KENTUCKY BOURBON lagged back to far turn, rallied along in the stretch while too late and settled for show spot. SUPER BROTHER no speed while never a factor throughout. PAST IMPERATIVE flashed inside speed to the half but came up empty and gave in readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Past Imperative
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the half, came up empty, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Kentucky Bourbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, lagged back to far turn, rallied on for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Super Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed while never a factor throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Chrome's Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed leader to the half, took over, cleared off, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Special A
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to far turn, rallied along widest while coming on late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PENNY'S PROSPECT ranged up outside to the turn, took over into stretch ridden out to the wire with a good effort. POWER ALLEY settled back from the gate to the turn, angled out full of run. COLLECT DIS MONEY inside speed to the hooked and stayed game for show spot. MONCRIEF raced along evenly with no response in the stretch. CARTOON CAPER broke tardy from the gate and never menaced. MAN WITH THE MOVES dueled early on with a steady faded from the turn. OUTSLEWTHEM tried hard from outside to the turn, gave way readily in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Power Alley
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back from the gate to the turn, angled out full of run

ENTRY.NAME: Moncrief
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Collect Dis Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the hooked and stayed game for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Man With the Moves
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early on with a steady faded from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Outslewthem
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried hard from outside to the turn, gave way readily in the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Cartoon Caper
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow and never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Penny's Prospect
ENTRY.COMMENT: ranged up outside to the turn, took over into stretch ridden out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED IN 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 1, 2023 Allo wed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLESS THE KITTEN unhurried to the turn, ran up outside to clear off in impressive fashion. OUT WORK'N chased leader to far turn off rail, stayed game for place spot while no match. TREASURY speed to the front stayed to quarter pole, gave in readily. JUNGLE JUICE (IRE) stayed close to the half, weakened in the stretch run. BRODYTHEOXMAN never close.

ENTRY.NAME: Brodytheoxman
ENTRY.COMMENT: never close

ENTRY.NAME: Jungle Juice (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stayed close to the half, weakened in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Treasury
ENTRY.OWNER: Johnson Robert K and Haselton Britt
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front stayed to quarter pole, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Bless the Kitten
ENTRY.OWNER: Wright Darlene and Wright James R
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, ran up outside to clear off impressive

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: Out Work'n
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to far turn off rail, stayed game for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 1, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Regi stered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,250).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FERRYBOAT perfect handling throughout, roused a bit stretch with an impressive effort. NOT YET CHARLIE off rail pursuit to far turn, rallied on while no match 2nd best. RUBINSTEIN could not keep up with the leaders, stayed on the show spot. TURBINADO chased winner to the half, gave way readily in the stretch. TOMAHAWK KITTEN never menaced throughout. ESPECIALLEA through after at half.

ENTRY.NAME: Tomahawk Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Especiallea
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after at half

ENTRY.NAME: Not Yet Charlie
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail pursuit to far turn, rallied on while no match 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Turbinado
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the half, gave way readily in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Rubinstein
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up with the leaders, stayed on the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Ferryboat
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect handling throughout, roused a bit stretch, impressive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Purse 18400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Any Maiden Races, And Only Claiming Races And Only Starter Ra ces For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT ESCAPE sharp speed, dueled to turn, took over to steadily draw off. BASTIEN LE BROWN bounced around from gate, recovered, ran on for place spot. DOCTOR WU raced along evenly with no kick, stayed on for show. DROP IT bounced around start, squeezed between early kept on late. TEQUILAS RANGER raced evenly throughout while outside stretch run. UNCLE CHARMING broke sharp from the gate to the front, dueled to the turn but came up empty from inside through the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Charming
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp from the gate to the front, dueled to the turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Wu
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no kick, stayed on for show

ENTRY.NAME: Drop It
ENTRY.COMMENT: bounced around start, squeezed between early kept on late

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Escape
ENTRY.OWNER: Hooves and Saddles LLC and Silver Lining Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp speed, dueled to turn, took over to steadily draw off

ENTRY.NAME: Bastien Le Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: bounced around from gate, recovered, ran on for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Tequilas Ranger
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly throughout while outside stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registere d Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,250). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTER MAN reserved early on to the far turn, made a steady run in the stretch to grind down leader and clear late under good handling to the wire. LEVEE PROUD battled to the half, took over into far turn, ran clear in the stretch run while no match for the winner and best of the rest. MIDNIGHT TEQUILA trailed the field to the half, angled widest past the quarter pole and rallied on mildly in the final furlong. CINDY'S STORM speed to the front, dueled to the half, chased to far turn while used up and faded back readily. ENGLISH CLASSIC never factored throughout. CUPID'S NUMBER a bit tardy at the start ran up and tracked leaders for a half but began to fade and dropped back from the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: English Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Cupid's Number
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders for a half, began to fade and dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Cindy's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, dueled to the half, chased to far turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Levee Proud
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled to the half, took over into far turn, ran clear, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed the filed to the half, angled widest quarter pole rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Mister Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved arly on to the far turn, grinded down leader, cleared

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Bob Cheek, Bridget Cheek & Nancy Vanier
